tit.j: 与謝野町コミュニティバス

sen.j: 与謝野町コミュニティバス（よさのちょうコミュニティバス）は、京都府与謝郡与謝野町内を運行するコミュニティバス。
sen.e: The Yosano-cho Community Bus is the community orriented bus operated in Yosano-cho, Yosa District, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Yosano-cho Community Bus is the community oriented bus operated in Yosano-cho, Yosa District, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Yosano-cho Community Bus is the community oriented bus operated in Yosano-cho, Yosa District, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 愛称名は『ひまわり』である。
sen.e: The public nickname of this bus is "Sunflower."
The public nickname of this bus is "Sunflower."
The public nickname of this bus is "Sunflower."
The management of the bus route is commissioned to the Tango Kairiku Transport, Co. Ltd..
The management of the bus route is commissioned to the Tango Kairiku Transport Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: コンマ削除しました。Co., Ltd.に訂正しました。
sen.e: The management of the bus route is commissioned to the Tango Kairiku Transport Co., Ltd.

sen.j: ※：曜日によって運行コースが異なる。
sen.e: *The operation route differs by the day of the week.
The operation route differs by the day of the week.
The operation route differs by the day of the week.

sen.j: ★：月曜・水曜・金曜のみ運行。
sen.e: :This route is operated only on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.
This route is operated only on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.
This route is operated only on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

sen.j: 鹿ノ熊 - 与謝保育園下（- 山河公民館 - 宇豆貴公民館） - 加悦SL広場 - 加悦の里 - 温江公民館上 - 加悦庁舎 - ウイル（← 加悦保育園前 ← 加悦奥十番組）
sen.e: Kanokuma - Yosa Day-care Center South (- Yamakawa Community Center - Uzuki Community Center) - Kaya SL Square - Kayanosato - Atsue Community Center North - Kaya Government Office - Will (<- Kaya Day-care Center Front <- Kayaoku Jyubangumi)
sen.cmt: 括弧内、順路を示すものと思われますが２バイトの→で表示されています。
sen.e: Kanokuma - Yosa Day-care Center South (- Yamakawa Community Center - Uzuki Community Center) - Kaya SL Square - Kayanosato - Atsue Community Center North - Kaya Government Office - Will (<- Kaya Day-care Center Front <- Kayaoku Jubangumi)

Kanokuma - Yosa Day-care Center South (- Yamakawa Community Center - Uzuki Community Center) - Kaya SL Square - Kayanosato - Atsue Community Center North - Kaya Government Office - Will (<- Kaya Day-care Center Front <- Kayaoku Jubangumi)

sen.j: ★：火曜・木曜・土曜のみ運行。
sen.e: :This route is operated only on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.
This route is operated only on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.
This route is operated only on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.

sen.j: 川上上 - 石川上地 - 亀山 - 野田川庁舎 - 明石団地（- ウイル） - 加悦庁舎 - 桑飼小学校下 - 香河上 - 大宮 - 亀山 - 野田川庁舎
sen.e: Kawakami North - Isikawa Kamiji - Kameyama - Nodagawa Government Office - Akasi Apartment (- Will) - Kaya Government Office - Kuwagai Elementary School Front - Kago North - Omiya - Kameyama - Nodagawa Government Office

sen.j: 庄ヶ崎 → 加悦庁舎 → 桑飼小学校下 → 香河上 → 大宮 → 川上上 → 石川上地 → 亀山 → 野田川庁舎

tit.e: The days without operation and service
The days without operation and service
The days without operation and service

sen.j: 全コースとも、日曜・祝祭日・年末年始（12月30日～翌年1月3日まで）は全便運休する。
sen.e: All the operation of the buses on Sunday, national holidays and New Year season (December 30-January 3) is suspended.
All the operation of the buses on Sunday, national holidays and New Year season (December 30 - January 3) is suspended.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。
sen.e: All the operation of the buses on Sunday, national holidays and New Year season (December 30 - January 3) is suspended.

sen.j: 大人：200円、小児：100円（回数券あり）
sen.e: Adult: 200 Yen, Child: 100 Yen (coupon tickets also available)

sen.j: 2009年（平成21年）3月16日 - 運行開始。
sen.e: The bus service began its operation on March 16, 2009.
